projects.name: Rhino
projects.description: Rhino is a real estate technology company replacing security deposits with a smarter alternative that’s better for both renters and landlords. Since 2018 we have been working on this project in close cooperation with the client developers team in NY. Our engineers work as Ruby on Rails and React.js/Redux/TypeScript developers. Significant achievements: built MVP almost from scratch; added integration with Yardi Voyager, developed recurring subscriptions flow with multiple Stripe accounts; built complex automatic reporting system for insurance partners.

projects.team: 2 backend developers, 1 frontend developer, Team leader
projects.name: Mastermind Manager
projects.description:
Mastermind Manager is a set of essential tools for mastermind group session management, brainstorming, goal setting, and accountability. Our team has been building this project from the beginning, using Ruby on Rails and React/Redux.
Major milestones:
  • Implemented WebRTC video integration with major platforms: Twilio, Vidyo.io, Jitsi Meet.
  • Developed integration with Stripe and Mailchimp/Mandrill
  • Later replaced Mailchimp email templates builder with own custom solution.

projects.name: Form2chat.io
projects.description: Form2chat is a serverless form backend that allows to receive form submissions directly to major chat platforms: Telegram, Messenger, Slack and Viber without using email or any additional services. Form2chat also provides advanced features like spam protection, auto-responses with custom templates, file uploads and Zapier integration. A team of developers from our company implemented this project from scratch and provided a full development service from initial design planning to maintenance in production.

projects.name: BlackInk
projects.team: 2 backend developers, 2 frontend developers, Team leader
projects.description:
BlackInk project goal was to simplify paywall integration for news and magazine publishers and provide an all-in-one platform both for readers and publishers. Our team built this project from scratch, and it consisted of 3 separate services:

  • Analytics API to track customers behavior through payment flow (Elixir and PhoenixFramework)
  • Readers dashboard with purchases and wallet (Ruby on Rails)
  • Lightweight javascript paywall library to be embedded to publishers websites

projects.name: School Management Software
projects.description:
An all-in-one tool to manage flight school. Our Elixir and PhoenixFramework engineers took this project from another company developers team. They were able to learn the codebase and continue project maintenance successfully. Our team was responsible for the development of a web dashboard and API for the iOS application.
Major milestones:
  • Built an automatic payment system that invoices user using flight data (via Stripe)
  • Added schools onboarding flow
  • Implemented Document Management System‎
